resources.string: Account registration for Pay to contact
- free call through desktop and mobile web applications. Free call option available for both, Personal Individuals and Legal Entities.
Raiffeisen BANK dd Bosnia and Herzegovina

With debit cards, you always have access to your funds and your business with us is easier and more efficient. We also offer you the possibility to use an overdraft on your debit card account, in case you need additional money. You can opt for the Visa Electron debit card and/or the Mastercard debit card.

Pay at any point of sale with a POS device. We offer you a solution, no matter if you need cash in installments or want to pay in installments free of interest. You can also opt to pay at least 3% monthly of the spent amount. You also have the option to defer payments up to 50 days free-of-interest.
Apply for a credit card online

Are you thinking about refurbishing your flat ? Are you dreaming of an unforgettable trip with your family ? Or simply, do you need additional cash to do whatever you want with it ? All the things you dream of can be yours with Raiffeisen bank. Easily!

To accomodate to your wishes, we have created various account sets. With an account set you can use several products from our offer, while saving costs and using additional benefits. You need a cash advanceor want to buy in installments without any interest or fees? You want to use a credit card? You need peace of mind for unpredictable financial needs? Then opt for the TRENDY PLUS set, which comes with a credit card and extra money always at your fingertips. You can also select a CLASSIC or TRENDY account set.
Open an account set with a debit card
"Appreciate your time ? Do business with the bank simply without having to go to the branch office. Choose your own: "

Saving is a positive habit that allows you to generate additional yields! You have extra money from time to time? You want to deposit that extra money without having to change the final agreement date? This shapeable type of saving allows you to place deposits and withdraw money as often as you like, while signing just one agreement. Saving for the future allows you as a parent to deposit money over time into a specially designed passbook - Raffe the Giraffe - until your child\'s full legal age.
Raiffeisen BANK dd Bosnia and Herzegovina
Court designation and court number: Municipal court in Sarajevo, 1 - 11629
FAQ about the use of Raiffeisen Mobile Banking
"If your question is not listed in the FAQs below or if you need additional information, please call our Contact Centre at: "
With the Raiffeisen Mobile Banking application you can bank with us via your smartphone, any time and anywhere around the world.

To use the application it is essential that you have access to the Internet - Wi-Fi or mobile data. This application encompasses a wide range of advanced online banking functionalities, and some of them are also available to customers who are not registered.

You can log into the application by entering PIN you created or via biometrics (if your device supports this option). You set PIN and / or biometrics as part of the service activation process, which can be changed later in the application.

In the section My Profile, you can find Settings that allow you to: Change the application langauge and the application theme; set biometrics identification (if you have not set it up during your registration); change your PIN and other application settings.
The basic application settings are as follows:
The application, in the background, is active up to 60 seconds
The maximum working time in the application is 20 minutes
The Account widget on the Dashboard is always active, but you can hide the balance of your account

The application is set by default to the language of your device. If your device is set to a local language, the application will be in the same language after installation. If another language is set on the device then the application will be in English. If English is not default language and you want to use it, you can make the change as follows:
Before you log in to the application - select the More option, and in the About the app section, turn on English
After you are logged in to the application - select the My Profile option and in the Settings section, turn on English.
Turn on / off the English language by tapping the toggle next to English.
You can change the language any time, regardless of whether you are logged into the application or not.
For your safety, please follow these instructions:
Avoid creating simple PIN codes (such as 0000, 1234, etc).
Do not share or write down your PIN code where others can see it
Sign out of the application after you finish using it
Use the internet through a secure Wi-Fi connection or mobile data
Be sure to delete the application from your smartphone when you stop using it
Make regular updates of your phone\'s operating system version
Download only certified and verified applications from the Play Store for Android, or App Store for your iOS mobile device
Update your RMB application regularly by downloading new versions
For the correct functioning of certain functionalities, the Mobile banking application requires the following permissions:
GPS - access to locations (to view the nearest branch office, ATM etc.)
Access to address book (to use the Pay to contact functionality)
All accounts in just one app
Check all your accounts\' balances with a simple swipe
Use filters to get an overview of your transactions and orders
24/7 transactions with just a few clicks
Light or dark? It\'s your choice.
Swiping left or right opens new options
Save this payment as a template?
You can view payment details at the next step. Your payments are always safe.
Enables payment to other private individuals or legal entities to the accounts with Raiffeisen Bank or other banks in BiH.
Note: This option does not support payment of public revenues. Please select an option \"Public revenue payment\".
App needs device\'s location access so we could display location correctly.
